info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 30 at 2:29PM EST until December 30 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EST FOR NORTHERN MONROE...SOUTHERN BUTTS...SOUTHWESTERN JASPER AND NORTHERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 228 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Goggins, or near Barnesville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Barnesville, Jackson, Forsyth, Flovilla, Milner, Aldora, Goggins, Berner, Chappel Mill, High Falls State Park, Blount, Liberty Hill, McElheneys Crossroads, Collier, Juliette, Johnstonville and Indian Springs State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
